pages.text: The normal morph is the default look for a ball python. $(br2) The body of a normal python is mostly light brown with a dark broken-up stripe down the spine and dark spots in the alien heads. The head is mostly dark brown with light stripes running through the eyes, and the belly is pale.

pages.title: Normal
pages.text: Type: Base $(funfact) This morph is also known as 'wild type' or, occasionally, 'classic'. $()
